aboutPage: We are the largest Omni channel fishing tackle retailer in Kuwait Our store is the vital touch point between anchor marine and our local fishing communities. For our customers, our stores complement our leading digital presence, providing market-leading, hands-on service, as well as a real sense of community. Our best-in-class websites and social media channels extend our reach to a growing number of other customers throughout Kuwait and the Middle East
vision: Is to provide encouragement, coaching, and support so that our customers have everything they need to get the most from their fishing regardless of their background or ability. To become Kuwaitâ€™s first choice Omni channel fishing tackle destination, regardless of experience or ability.
ambition: We have a long-term strategy to become the leading fishing tackle retailer in Kuwait by inspiring and delighting increasing numbers of customers, focusing on sustainable growth, and enhancing local fishing communities.
